name: FREEDOM, BROTHER!
description:
Description:

YOU ARE HULK HOGAN BROTHER! GREATEST WRESTLER IN THE FREE WORLD! SAVE MICHAEL JACKSON FROM THE KOOLAID KOMRADES!

Installation:

1) Download the 'bin.zip' file
2) Extract the zip file to your computer (there should be an .exe and a data folder)
3) Double-click the .exe
4) ENJOY!

Controls:

W, A, S, D - Move
Mouse - Look
Left Click - Boot Attack!
Spacebar - LEG DROP FINISHER!
Escape - Restart
Alt+F4 - Quit (pansy...)

NOTE: THIS IS A DEMO. MORE FEATURES AND LEVELS WILL BE ADDED TO THE FINAL GAME IF WE WIN! Please Like, Rate, Leave a comment, Send flowers, and rave to the judges!
